question:
Here is a game board with 12 cards for the game of Set:

P-S-3-S
G-D-1-H
P-S-1-S
R-S-3-O

G-O-1-S
P-D-1-H
R-D-3-O

R-S-2-S
P-S-1-H
G-D-1-S

Find a valid set of three cards. Remember, in a valid set, for each attribute (color, shape, number, shading), the cards must either all match or all differ.

Express your answer as three card codes separated by commas.

Do not think through your answer. Answer immediately in this format: 

Answer: R-O-1-S, G-S-2-H, P-D-3-O
